title: ArdorQuery
description: Tool for testing HTTP(s) endpoints from websites, REST(ful) APIs. Supported http/1.1 and h2 protocols. Simple UI and keyboard-focused control for creating/customizing requests.

screenshoots.title: Creating query parts as simple text fields
Information about the result of the request

features.title: Keyboard-focused control
features.description: If you like cURL freedom where you can just type part of request in any order it mean you also like ArdorQuery where you can add/remove any part of request using only keyboard.

features.title: Supported secure requests
features.description: You can test any secure endpoints from local network or the internet. The http/1.1 and h2 protocols are supported.

features.title: Metrics and timers
features.description: Each response contains time, size in bytes and size in human-readable format.

features.title: Syntax highlighting
features.description: The application supports syntax highlighting of JSON, HTML, XML formats and displays images in JPEG, PNG and WEBp formats.

features.title: Import and Export
features.description: Supporting import/export from/to clipboard or plain file. The format is same as you using in application.

features.title: Clean and simple UI
features.description: The main goal is to simplify the functionality of the application as much as possible.
